content.prompt: The patterns of settlement shown in the map culminated in which of the following national crises by 1820 ?

choices.label: Outrage over the Federalist Party’s disloyalty in proposing New England’s secession
Widespread opposition to the demands of the women’s rights advocates at Seneca Falls
The emergence of sectional tensions over the admission of the state of Missouri
Disbelief at the violence resulting from popular sovereignty in Kansas

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
